name: Space Bus
description:
Made for Small World Jam

You are a space bus driver. Your bus can accelerate at 2g indefinitely. Today you're taking a quick trip to the Moon, and you should be there in about 2 and a half hours ... unless you mess it up.

I only spent like 8 hours on this, so it's unfinished, unpolished, and a bit buggy with the physics. It's still pretty fun to mess around in though.
